Index.title: I'm
Index.subTitle: Hi, I'm Denis. Experienced Full-Stack developer from Ukraine based on Nextjs/Nestjs.
Index.aboutSubTitle: Creation of sites with clean cross-browser code. BEM, CSS3, HTML5, MERN, JavaScript, ES6, mongodb, React.js, express.js, node.js.
Index.text1: Sites on order, on a technical basis or on a turnkey basis Online stores, news, landings, interactive, etc.
Index.li1: I have extensive experience in the development and optimization of sites, web applications.
Index.li2: I work for the result, my goal is a quality product.
Index.li4: Clean, readable and logically built code.
Index.li5: Do not cut off feedback after the project is completed.
Index.text2: Within a week after the transfer of the project, I will make changes to the project for free and immediately, if necessary.
